resources.string: Thank you for signing up, valued customer! Please tell me:
Work a shift behind the counter
What can I do for you today,
Aperture Hand-held Portal Device: 1618 gold\nNote: For testing purposes only. Under no circumstances point this at the moon.
Blue Shell: 35 gold\nWinners beware! Use in case someone gets waaaaaay too ahead of the rest.
Buster Sword: 450 gold\nLook, I\'m not gonna sit here and tell you it doesn\'t look cool, but is it practical?
Cubone Mask: 44 gold\n You know there\'s gotta be a sad story behind this thing, right? Offers mild protection from physical but not emotional attacks.
Fairy in a Bottle: 80 gold\nShe patches you up when you\'re defeated. Wait a minuteâ€¦ is this Navi???
Loki Mask: 404 gold\nWatch out with this one, he gets quite zany at night. Somebody stop him!
l Piece: 20 gold\nTetris! I suppose you could use this to bash some Stalfos over the head if you needed to.
Miraak Mask: 200 gold\nThe price of knowledge is often repaid to an unspeakable cosmic horror of tangled tentacles and bubbling eyes.
Nihilus Mask: 205 gold\nHave you ever heard the parable of Pelagius the Wise? Well this is not he. But still works well if you need to take care of some younglings.
Ocarina of Time: 330 gold\nPlay a little ditty and find yourself whisked away on the wind to anywhere in Hyrule. Also helpful if you want to milk some cows.
Pip Boy: 100 gold\nThis will help you navigate the barren wastelands beyond this place. Maybe don\'t strap it on your body though, my Geiger counter is going nuts
Predator Mask: 175 gold\nThe visage of a hunter from beyond the stars. If you find yourself in their sights, don\'t bother with the Ocarina. Just run.
Wabbajack: 223 gold\n This Daedric artifact belongs to the Prince of Madness. I wonder what would happen if you used this along with Loki\'s mask?
Windwaker: 300 gold\nSummon the wind and sail across the vast expanses of Hyrule Ocean.
Deku Shield: 12 gold\nOffers slight protection from the monsters of Hyrule. Perfect for kids or short adventurers. Made from the bark of the Great Deku Tree.
Dragonpriest Mask: 300 gold\nGreat for Fus Roh Dahing trolls off of High Hrothgar. Don\'t worry about the smell, 1000 years on a corpse will do that.
Mana Potion: 15 gold\n For when you couldn\'t cast another fireball, just take a swig and get back to incinerating draugr.
Pegasus Boots: 200 gold\n These are necessary to advance in some dungeon or another, probably. They\'re like Red Bull for your feet!
Phoenix Down: 30 gold\nParty members lying down on the job? Tickle them with this and watch them spring to their feet! Plucked from a phoenix while it slept.
Wooden Shield: 40 gold\nSturdy protection for Hylian adventurers. Warranty voided if used at Death Mountain volcano or any fire-type dungeon.
Meridia\'s Beacon: 0 gold\nSorry for doing this to you, but it\'s already in your inventory. A new hand touches the beacon!
Master Sword: 400 gold\nThe sword destined for the Hero of Time! Allows you to do the whirly attack thing.
Health Potion: 10 gold\nRecovers a moderate amount of HP. Quick, gulp it down now before the thing that\'s trying to kill you comes back! Please drink responsibly.
Heart Container: 150 gold\nUse this to increase your max health. Now you can take a more severe beating! Neat!
Hookshot: 100 gold\nPoint, hook, and launch yourself bodily to those suspicious target-looking decorations in that one dungeon. Great for dragging enemies as well!
Hylian Shield: 75 gold\nOnly the most skilled blacksmiths ih Hyrule can craft these. Suitable for any worthy hero.
Iron Boots: 150 gold\n Needed for the Water Temple, which everyone hates. Great for strength training, Rock Lee style!
Majora\'s Mask: 666 gold\nOnce used by Skull Kid to drag the Moon to Termina, now just a fancy mask for your next dinner party!
Tell me, what do you think is a fair trade for the marvelous items below?
If I ever see you around here again, I will turn you into a Deku Scrub and use you for kindling. Take this mask as a warning and
Are you looking for an item in particular?
Your hoard has grown to an impressive:
